00034 #ifndef _SINGLETON_H__
00035 #define _SINGLETON_H__
00036 
00037 // Added by Steve Streeting for Ogre
00038 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00039 
00040 #if OGRE_COMPILER == OGRE_COMPILER_MSVC
00041 // Turn off warnings generated by this singleton implementation
00042 #   pragma warning (disable : 4311)
00043 #   pragma warning (disable : 4312)
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 namespace Ogre {
00047 // End SJS additions
00050     template <typename T> class Singleton
00051     {
00052     protected:
00053 
00054         static T* ms_Singleton;
00055 
00056     public:
00057         Singleton( void )
00058         {
00059             assert( !ms_Singleton );
00060 #if defined( _MSC_VER ) && _MSC_VER < 1200   
00061             int offset = (int)(T*)1 - (int)(Singleton <T>*)(T*)1;
00062             ms_Singleton = (T*)((int)this + offset);
00063 #else
00064         ms_Singleton = static_cast< T* >( this );
00065 #endif
00066         }
00067         ~Singleton( void )
00068             {  assert( ms_Singleton );  ms_Singleton = 0;  }
00069         static T& getSingleton( void )
00070         {   assert( ms_Singleton );  return ( *ms_Singleton ); }
00071         static T* getSingletonPtr( void )
00072         { return ms_Singleton; }
00073     };
00074 }
00075 #endif
